testcase.name: Complete checkout with valid details
testcase.system-out: Given I have added "Samsung galaxy s6" to my cart...........................passed When I proceed to cart and place order......................................passed And I fill order form with name "Eshika Bose", country "India", city "Kolkata", credit card "1234567890", month "12", year "2025".passed And I confirm purchase......................................................passed Then I should see a confirmation dialog with purchase details...............passed
